name: The Daily Good 19.3.22
description:
Everyday in my kids meditation classes I ask "What's going good?"

(That's where this project originated.)

Some days that's a challenge for people to answer.  
On those days I tell them to think about something you're grateful for, because the things we have gratitude for are usually things that are going good.

I remind them that some of the things we can be grateful for are the simple things that we might take for granted.

One of my favorite examples is running water in our homes.

I am so grateful that I can get good clean water from one of 5 different places in my home.

I am so grateful that I don't have to spend time walking to get my water (there are people in the world that still have to do that).

I am so grateful that the water is clean and readily available.

It's a simple thing we don't think about much, but what would life be like without it...
